<<<<<<< HEAD
A brief defence, of the old and succesful method of curing continual fevers in opposition to Doctor Brown and his vindicatory schedule. Forrest, James, fl. 1694.
160 p.
printed by George Mosman, and are to be sold at his shop in the Parliament Closs [sic], Edinburgh : M. DC. XCIV. [1694]
Dedication signed: James Forrest. Running title: A brief defence of the old and successful method, &c. Reproduction of the original in the Edinburgh University Library.
=======
